short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We find online deals on popular products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension opens a new browser tab to a custom costhelpers.com URL.  It allows you to search the web, and also see the latest products we've added to our site.
